root: ^I am Jack, one out of three game masters in this dimension.
^This world was constructed by a mysterious individual who has captured you and was the one who put you here.
^You are forced to play three levels to break free.
^Your mind is fractured and memory is jumbled but,
^if you see any fragments along the way, try to collect them and surely they shall guide you and your mind out of here.
^Here, in this land that is frozen in time, your dash possesses the power to momentarily freeze the motion of moving and falling platforms.
^Use this power to overcome the hazards and challenges that lie in your path.
^Venture forth, Nigiri, and may your skills serve as your compass, guiding you towards the truth that awaits on the path ahead.
